thread.title: DA's Maimane lays charges against ANC's Chancellor House
thread.title_full: DA's Maimane lays charges against ANC's Chancellor House | News24

author: news24.com
title: DA's Maimane lays charges against ANC's Chancellor House
text:
Johannesburg - The Democratic Alliance says it will not allow the African National Congress to use its power to enrich itself, prompting the official opposition party to lay a criminal charge against the party's investment arm, Chancellor House, on Wednesday.
This comes after reports surfaced indicating Hitachi had allegedly made improper payments to the ANC.
Hitachi won the tender to provide Eskom with boilers for the Medupi and Kusile power stations.
On Monday, the US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) announced it had charged the Tokyo-based conglomerate with violating the Foreign Corrupt Practices Act.
